page.title: 12A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I wake at 6 am.and lie in bed listening to the radio until 7am.Then I get dressed and have breakfast.After washing,I walk,then feed my dog and water and feed the hens.I wash my hands, pack my school bag and set off for school.Nichola's mum picks me up at 8:50. School starts at9am.,with the register and assembly.We work at maths and English most of the morning, with a break at 10:30 until 10:50.On Tuesdays we go swimming at Martley.We have lunch at 12:15 and are usually playing by 12:40.We play skipping or elastics, which is where you jump over elastic held round the legs of two people. In the afternoon we have art or needlework, stories,French etc. When I get home I ride Misty then walk my dog.After tea Ihave a wash and watch television until bedtime at 9pm.
